info.sourceTextContent: Una escena terrible, por un descuido de Felipe, tuvo lugar. Le sorprendió su esposa con la querida... Grande fue el escándalo que circuló por toda la Córte, y grande fue el trabajo que le costó contener la furia de su mancillada esposa, porque esta ya no pensaba mas que en la venganza. ¡Y cosa admirable en esta mujer!... De esta venganza no queria fuese participe su esposo, pues aunque habia llegado á notar el despego y descaro con que solia tratarla, no obstante lo idolatraba de todo corazon.
info.suspiciousTextContent: A terrible scene, through an oversight of Philip, took place. He surprised his wife with dear ... Great was the scandal that circulated throughout the Court, and great was the work cost him the fury of his wife tarnished because this was not thinking more than in the revenge. And something admirable about this woman! ... This revenge was involved did not want his husband, as though he had come to notice the indifference and disdain that used to treat, however idolized him wholeheartedly
